attributes.action: Challenge Gordon Brown on his new Stealth Tax from Senior Citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The latest Budget proposals, removing the 10p tax on the first £2,150 above the personal allowance, and dropping 2p from all other income is leaving thousands of pensioners worse off, and all the other stealth taxes combined are putting us into poverty, we are the ones who fought for freedom, brought our children up, without state handouts, and worked instead of sitting at home on benefits, now we are being penalised for it. "Fair play and pensioner care"
  has been wiped from the Bounds of Government Remit.
